config.enabled.name: Enable Mod
config.enabled.desc: Toggle the mod on or off.
config.base_chance.name: Base Chance
config.base_chance.desc: The base percentage chance an NPC will gift you back (0.01 = 1%).
config.scaling.name: Enable Scaling
config.scaling.desc: If enabled, higher friendship levels increase the chance of receiving a gift.
config.heart_chance.name: Chance Per Heart
config.heart_chance.desc: How much extra chance is added per friendship heart (0.005 = +0.5%).
config.max_value.name: Max Gift Value
config.max_value.desc: The maximum sell price of items NPCs can give you. Prevents receiving overpowered items.
